word_mean: 韧皮部：植物维管组织的一种结构，在树干和树根之间上下输送合成的营养物质和葡萄糖，有筛管为其特征。参见xylem

sentence.Network_en: Phloem elements and adjacent tissues are the principal feeding sites for most aphids.
sentence.Network_cn: 韧皮部及其邻近组织是大多数蚜虫的主要取食部位.

sentence.Network_en: The stele includes all primary tissues derived from the procambium consists of pericycle, phloem and xylem.
sentence.Network_cn: 中柱包括从原形成层衍生而来的全部初生组织,由中柱鞘 、 韧质部和木质部组成.

sentence.Network_en: Primary phloem PHLOEM derived from the procambium in the young plant.
sentence.Network_cn: 初生韧皮部:指幼嫩植物中来源于原形成层的韧皮部.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 韧皮部（phloem） 筛管、筛胞、伴胞、纤维、薄壁细胞。运输有机物。

纺织英语_百度文库 ... woody 木质的 phloem 韧皮 stalk 茎.

list.abs: 韧皮纤维(phloem fiber)分布于韧皮部内，但有时把出现在皮层和维管束鞘部分的纤维也称为韧皮纤维。韧皮纤维的细胞壁虽厚，但含纤维.
phloem fiber 韧皮纤维phloem ray 韧皮放射组织phloem transport 韧皮运输
...这与根的发育状态、根的粗细有一定关系。(3)初生韧皮部(primary phloem)。其主要功能是输导有机物质.
phloem 韧皮部phloem bundle 韧皮束phloem fiber 韧皮纤维

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Greek phloos 'bark' + the passive suffix -ēma

means.word_mean: 1. (botany) tissue that conducts synthesized food substances (e.g., from leaves) to parts where needed; consists primarily of sieve tubes
